summary: This is an email from December 21, 2020, regarding a subpoena to the Epstein estate for images and videos. The sender is inquiring about the status of the subpoena and its location in case files, as they plan to follow up with the estate attorneys.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.role: Deceased individual whose estate is subject to subpoena
persons.context: The email discusses a subpoena directed at the Epstein estate for images and videos, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to his assets or evidence.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein estate subpoena
events.description: An email is sent inquiring about the status and location of a subpoena to the Epstein estate for images and videos, as part of ongoing legal proceedings.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to the Epstein estate for images and videos, indicating a search for potential evidence.
As of December 2020, the status of this subpoena was unclear, prompting an internal inquiry.
The email suggests ongoing legal efforts to obtain materials from Epstein's estate after his death.
